From my future self, I would like to know what advice they have for me to navigate the challenges that lie ahead in my career and personal life.
I would ask my past self to share any regrets or lessons learned that I can carry with me moving forward to make better decisions.
From my future self, I would ask for tips on managing stress and maintaining a healthy work-life balance.
I would love to know my future self's response to my current goals and to help me refine them.
I would like to be reminded by my past self of my strengths and accomplishments, to stay motivated and confident.
